Texto: 
noncontributory.
axial and coronal mr images demonstrate a left adrenal mass that is isointense on t1, t2, and t2 fat sat sequences.  signal drop out is demonstrated on out-of-phase sequences.
adrenal adenoma
none.
60 year-old male with newly diagnosed colon cancer and a left adrenal mass that was incompletely characterized on staging ct.
